entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
